text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Kylie, dear, the 1st rule of flackdom is the flack (you) needs to know more about the subject (testing) than the audience (us). Read this @nytimes article about US testing. Lying for Chump doesn’t cut it when 60,000 of us are dead & it’s your guy’s fault. https://t.co/lWbYv0Oz8A
